Detailed Description

Statement implementation for a continue or 'coherent' continue statement in the program.

Member Data Documentation

const bool ContinueStmt::doCoherenceCheck [private]

This indicates whether the generated code will check to see if no more program instances are currently running after the continue, in which case the code can have a jump to the end of the current loop.
